          <title>
            <string language="en">Shadow from different lightings</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schatten von den unterschiedlichen Beleuchtungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ombre de différents éclairages</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sombra dos lightings diferentes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ombra dalle illuminazione differenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σκιά από τους διαφορετικούς φωτισμούς</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sombra de diversas iluminaciones</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the setup for determining the shadow produced by the light bulb and the fluorescent strip light on a piece of wood.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lighting</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light bulb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">shadow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wood</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Installation für die 
Bestimmung des Schattens, der durch die Glühlampe und das 
Leuchtstoffstreifenlicht auf einem Stück Holz produziert wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'installation pour 
déterminer l'ombre produite par l'ampoule et la lumière fluorescente
de bande sur un morceau de bois.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a instalação para 
determinar a sombra produzida pelo bulbo claro e pela luz fluorescente
da tira em uma parte de madeira.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la messa a punto per 
la determinazione dell'ombra prodotta dalla lampadina e dalla luce 
fluorescente della striscia su una parte di legno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την οργάνωση για τον 
καθορισμό της σκιάς που παράγεται από τον ελαφρύ βολβό και το 
φθορισμού φως λουρίδων σε ένα κομμάτι του ξύλου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la disposición para 
determinar la sombra producida por la bombilla y la luz fluorescente 
de la tira en un pedazo de madera.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beleuchtung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Glühlampe</string>
          </keyword>
